text: but the Levites shall camp around the tabernacle of the covenant to ensure that God's wrath will not fall upon the Israelite community. The Levites shall keep guard over the tabernacle of the covenant.
King Solomon sent to have him brought down from the altar, and he came and paid homage to King Solomon. Solomon then said to him, “Go to your house.”
They drove Israel into hiding, wherever places of refuge could be found.
The hungry he has filled with good things; the rich he has sent away empty.
